00051 #ifndef _GRASSMANN_EXCEPTION_H
00052 #define _GRASSMANN_EXCEPTION_H
00053 
00054 #include <exception>
00055 
00056 namespace grassmann {
00057 
00062         class UnequalMatrixSizeException : public std::exception {
00063                 public:
00064                         UnequalMatrixSizeException() {}
00065 
00066                         const char* what() const throw()  {
00067                                 return "Invalid operation between matrixes with incompatible sizes";
00068                         }
00069         };
00070 
00075         class InvalidMatrixIndexException : public std::exception {
00076                 public:
00077                         InvalidMatrixIndexException() {}
00078                         
00079                         const char* what() const throw() {
00080                                 return "Trying access to an invalid index for the matrix";
00081                         }
00082         };
00083 
00088         class NullMatrixDiagException : public std::exception {
00089                 public:
00090                         NullMatrixDiagException() {}
00091                         
00092                         const char* what() const throw() {
00093                                 return "Singular matrix";
00094                         }
00095         };
00096 
00101         class NotSquareMatrixException : public std::exception {
00102                 public:
00103                         NotSquareMatrixException() {}
00104                         
00105                         const char* what() const throw() {
00106                                 return "The given matrix is not square";
00107                         }
00108         };
00109 
00114         class UndefinedSystemException : public std::exception {
00115                 public:
00116                         UndefinedSystemException() {}
00117                         const char* what() const throw() {
00118                                 return "The given linear system is undefined";
00119                         }
00120         };
00121 
00127         class UnequalVectorSizeException : public std::exception {
00128                 public:
00129                         UnequalVectorSizeException() {}
00130                         
00131                         const char* what() const throw() {
00132                                 return "The size of the two vectors is not the same";
00133                         }
00134         };
00135

00142                 public:

00156                 public:
00157                         SingularMatrixException() {}
00158                         
00159                         const char* what() const throw() {
